Referee per le seguenti riviste: Urban Studies*; Journal of Planning Education and Research; Planning Theory;* Action Research;* De Ethica; Environment, Development and Sustainability; OpenSage;* Journal of Language and Culture*; Ethical Theory and Moral Practice; Partecipazione e Conflitto – The Open Journal of Sociopolitical Studies; Journal of Rural studies; Antipode; Rivista Geografica Italiana; ACME-An international Journal for Critical Geographers; Cities; Sustainability [* più di una volta]
